nodatafound: I didn't found previous data senpai. I'll be loaded like for the first time. Gomen
retrievingdata: It looks like something important. hmmm. Oh! Previous data! I'm loading!
greyuser: Sorry, but only bouncers and up can run me. :(
bouncer: I can't move people if you are just bouncer! b-baka >.<
online: There we go! Let's go work for community!
welcome: Welcome %%NAME%%!! ^^ I'm Kami. Nice to see you here ^^ :)
welcomeback: Welcome back, %%NAME%%!! ^^ I'm glad you came here again! ^^
songknown: :repeat: This song was played %%PLAYS%% time(s) in the last %%TIMETOTAL%%, last play was %%LASTTIME%% ago. :repeat:
timelimit: I'm skipping your song. It's longer than maximum allowed song lenght (%%MAXLENGTH%% minutes) @%%NAME%%
permissionownsong: :up: @%%NAME%% has permission to play their own production!
isblacklisted: I can't allow to play this song. It's on the %%BLACKLIST%% blacklist! Sorry :'(
isopen: /me The roulette is now open! Type !join to participate!
winnerpicked: /me A winner has been picked! @%%NAME%% to position %%POSITION%%.
alreadyadding: /me User is already being added! Changed the desired position to %%POSITION%%.
adding: /me Added @%%NAME%% to the queue. Current queue: %%POSITION%%.
usernotfound: I don't see him here you dude.
notdisconnected: Sorry @%%NAME%% but I didn't find you in waitlist database. :(
noposition: I don't see you here. Wait till waitlist will be updated and then try again.
toolongago: My senpai said I can't move you, because you disconnected too long ago (%%TIME%%) :/ @%%NAME%%
valid: @%%NAME%%. You disconnected just %%TIME%% ago and I can move you back to your position %%POSITION%%. There we go!
warning1: @%%NAME%%, you are afk for %%TIME%%. I have order from senpai to kick you out from wait list after 20 minutes of being AFK.
warning2: @%%NAME%%, do you agree with kick from waitlist?
afkremove: @%%NAME%%, silence is like agreement. You was kicked from waitlist, possition %%POSITION%%. Don't be afk so much and talk to me. I have feelings too and it hurts if you are afk T_T
askskip: @%%NAME%%, please, don't ask us for skips.
roomadvertising: /me @%%NAME%%, don't post links to other rooms please.
adfly: /me @%%NAME%%, please change your autowoot program. We suggest PlugCubed: http://plugcubed.net/
newblacklisted: /me [@%%NAME%%] This track belongs on the %%BLACKLIST%% blacklist! [ %%AUTHOR%% - %%TITLE%% - %%MID%% ]
voteskiplimit: /me [@%%NAME%%] I have order to skip song when Mehs reach %%LIMIT%%!!
voteskipexceededlimit: /me @%%NAME%%, your song has exceeded the voteskip limit (%%LIMIT%% mehs).
voteskipinvalidlimit: /me [@%%NAME%%] Invalid voteskip limit, please try again using a number to signify the number of mehs.
voteskipsetlimit: /me [@%%NAME%%] Your request was accepted. Voteskip limit set to %%LIMIT%%.
activeusersintime: /me [@%%NAME%% There have been %%AMOUNT%% users chatting in the past %%TIME%% minutes.
maximumafktimeset: /me [@%%NAME%%] Maximum afk duration set to %%TIME%% minutes.
autowoot: I recommend RCS for autowooting: https://radiant.dj/rcs
brandambassador: /me A Brand Ambassador is the voice of the plug.dj users. They promote events, engage the community and share the plug.dj message around the world. For more info: http://blog.plug.dj/brand-ambassadors/
bouncerplusrank: /me [@%%NAME%%] You have to be manager or up to enable Bouncer+.
nousercookie: /em doesn't see %%NAME%% in room and eats a cookie himself.
selfcookie: /me @%%NAME%%, you're a bit greedy, aren't you? Giving cookies to yourself, bah. Share some with other people!
cycleguardtime: /me [@%%NAME%%] The cycleguard is set to %%TIME%% minute(s).
dclookuprank: /me [@%%NAME%%] Only bouncers and above can do a lookup for others.
notinwaitlist: /me @%%NAME%%, you are not on the waitlist.
eta: /me @%%NAME%% you will reach the booth in approximately %%TIME%%.
starterhelp: /me This image will get you started on plug: %%LINK%%
roulettejoin: /me @%%NAME%% joined the roulette! (!leave if you regret it.)
jointime: /me [@%%NAMEFROM%%] @%%USERNAME%% has been in the room for %%TIME%%.
kickrank: /me [@%%NAME%%] you can't kick users with an equal or higher rank than you!
kick: /me [@%%NAME%%], @%%USERNAME%% you are being kicked from the community for %%TIME%% minutes.
lockskippos: /me [@%%NAME%%] Lockskip will now move the dj to position %%POSITION%%.
lockguardtime: /me [@%%NAME%%] The lockguard is set to %%TIME%% minute(s).
maxlengthtime: /me [@%%NAME%%] The maximum song duration is set to %%TIME%% minutes.
addbotwaitlist: /me @%%NAME%%, don't try to add me to the waitlist, please.
mutedmaxtime: /me [@%%NAME%%] You can only mute for maximum %%TIME%% minutes.
muterank: /me [@%%NAME%%] You can't mute persons with an equal or higher rank than you.
removenotinwl: /me [@%%NAME%%] Specified user @%%USERNAME%% is not in the waitlist.
roomrules: /me Please find the room rules here: %%LINK%%
sessionstats: /me [@%%NAME%%] Total woots: %%WOOTS%%, total mehs: %%MEHS%%, total grabs: %%GRABS%%.
madeby: My senpai is Kouta-nya. He edited BasicBot script from Yemasthui and made ME! It's pleasure to be here with you all. ^^
activefor: I'm working %%TIME%% yet. So tired. I'll try not to slzZzZzZzzzz... Huh? I can't sleep T_T. Hope senpai didn't notice dat > . <
swapinvalid: /me [@%%NAME%%] Invalid user specified. (No names with spaces!)
swapwlonly: /me [@%%NAME%%] I cant swap ppl which are not in waitlist, b-baka > . <
genres: /me Please find the permissible room genres here: %%LINK%%
unmuteeveryonerank: /me [@%%NAME%%] Only managers and up can unmute everyone at once.
unmuterank: /me [@%%NAME%%] You can't unmute persons with an equal or higher rank than you.
commandscd: /me [@%%NAME%%] My senpai set cooldown for commands to %%TIME%% seconds.
website: /me Did you notice we have a website? Check it out here > %%LINK%%
